tag_list: azlan, raj, digital, strategy, social-media, e-commerce
overview:
Azlan specialises in integrated digital strategy and online performance. With extensive experience in online retail, social media and hybrid social behaviour online. Looking at both customer behaviour and industry trends, Azlan focuses on engagement to help brands communicate with their customers.

Azlan has previously worked for high profile companies such as ChoicesUK and social media company Webjam. He has written for Interfaces magazine for his expertise in the industry, provided training to top agencies in the East of England and has a diverse experience of different online offerings. His direct work experience ranges in Government, finance, online retail, pharmaceutical and social media; with even further experience agency side across different industries.
